review: Quit working after 24 hours. Remote kept losing connection, unit would freeze up, then couldn't reconnect to wireless network. Roku suggested I contact my ISP provider and manufacturer of my wireless router to resolve the problem, despite the fact that none of my other wireless devices had connection issues. I'm going back to my Roku Classic--it may be old but it works!

review: Still getting accustomed to this little device. Controls behave differently from our main Roku. Plugs into a USB port, and can take power from it if the bus isn't already loaded to the max. Otherwise needs to use the supplied wall wart for power. Really enjoy the service Roku provides. Conveniently transferrable from one set to another.
